elements.label: A Rattling Experience
elements.description: "What I have lived through has shaken me too my core. Traces of it keep echoing in the hollow spaces of my soul, and in each reverberation renew its disquiet."

elements.label: A Rattling Experience
elements.description: "What I have lived through has shaken me too my core. Traces of it keep echoing in the hollow spaces of my soul, and in each reverberation renew its disquiet."

elements.label: A Rattling Experience

elements.label: A Dreadful Experience
elements.description: <"A deep gloom has settled over my being after the past events. Soon, it might end up staining me until only darkness filters through to my heart.">

elements.label: A Dreadful Experience
elements.description: <"A deep gloom has settled over my being after the past events. Soon, it might end up staining me until only darkness filters through to my heart.">

elements.label: A Dreadful Experience
elements.description: <"A deep gloom has settled over my being after the past events. Soon, it might end up staining me until only darkness filters through to my heart.">

elements.label: An Unsettling Experience
elements.description: <My heart rate will not return to its regular beating. At the slightest sound my thoughts spiral away in unruly patterns.>

elements.label: An Unsettling Experience
elements.description: <My heart rate will not return to its regular beating. At the slightest sound my thoughts spiral away in unruly patterns.>

elements.label: An Unsettling Experience
elements.description: <My heart rate will not return to its regular beating. At the slightest sound my thoughts spiral away in unruly patterns.>

elements.label: An Vivid Experience
elements.description: <I have peeked past the veil that covers the black seas of existence, and the sights I’ve seen will not leave me. When I close my eyes, the sights return.>

elements.label: An Vivid Experience
elements.description: <I have peeked past the veil that covers the black seas of existence, and the sights I’ve seen will not leave me. When I close my eyes, the sights return.>

elements.label: An Vivid Experience
elements.description: <I have peeked past the veil that covers the black seas of existence, and the sights I’ve seen will not leave me. When I close my eyes, the sights return.>

elements.label: An Unraveling Experience
elements.description: <I have been rent. The strain of what occurred has caused a fraying at my edges, and I fear what part of me may get torn away.>

elements.label: An Unraveling Experience
elements.description: <I have been rent. The strain of what occurred has caused a fraying at my edges, and I fear what part of me may get torn away.>

elements.label: An Unraveling Experience
elements.description: <I have been rent. The strain of what occurred has caused a fraying at my edges, and I fear what part of me may get torn away.>

elements.label: A Divisive Experience
elements.description: <What has occurred has not been easy on the crew. If I do not rally them, tempers will rise and some will seek less straining employ.>

elements.label: A Divisive Experience
elements.description: <What has occurred has not been easy on the crew. If I do not rally them, tempers will rise and some will seek less straining employ.>

elements.label: A Sobering Experience
elements.description: <Sometimes the most horrible shock is a shift in perspective. What value lies in what I chase behind the waves>

elements.label: A Sobering Experience
elements.description: <Sometimes the most horrible shock is a shift in perspective. What value lies in what I chase behind the waves>

elements.label: A Sobering Experience
elements.description: <Sometimes the most horrible shock is a shift in perspective. What value lies in what I chase behind the waves>

elements.label: A Sophorific Experience
elements.description: <The aftermath of the event still clings to me like nettles or old perfume. I may wish for nothing more than to be rid of it, or nothing more than to experience the more, the more, the more.>

elements.label: A Sophorific Experience

elements.label: An Experience of Pain
elements.description: <I have been hurt, and now hurt is echoing through my systems, turning my sensens to plinters, and my heartbeat to a dull throb.>

elements.label: An Experience of Pain
elements.description: <I have been hurt, and now hurt is echoing through my systems, turning my sensens to plinters, and my heartbeat to a dull throb.>

elements.label: An Experience of Pain

elements.label: The Experience of Impairment
elements.description: <I have been wounded, and my limbs do not serve me as they ought too. And as a captain I know that if one part fails, the whole is in peril.>
